R0:
en
conf t
int s0/1/0
ip add 202.39.70.1 255.255.255.252
no sh 
exit

en
conf t

ip route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 202.39.50.13



RB:
en
conf t
hostname RB
int g0/0
ip add 202.39.50.13 255.255.255.240
no sh
exit
int s0/1/1
ip add 202.39.70.2 255.255.255.252
no sh
exit
ip route 202.39.61.0 255.255.255.0 202.39.50.1
ip route 202.39.62.0 255.255.255.0 202.39.50.2
ip route 202.39.63.0 255.255.255.0 202.39.50.3
ip route 202.39.64.0 255.255.255.0 202.39.50.4
ip route 202.39.40.0 255.255.255.0 s0/1/0
